website_summaries.verdict: Motorola's fast, stylish Droid Razr Maxx HD offers outstanding battery life, but its camera captures unimpressive images.
pros: The Motorola Droid Razr Maxx HD (Verizon) offers fast performance, a big eye-popping screen, and luxurious design
It also has great call quality, lots of storage, 4G data speeds, and unbeatable battery life
cons: The Droid Razr Maxx HD's major weakness is a camera that produces subpar images
The phone is filled with Verizon bloatware as well

customer_reviews.title: great seller and phone it is great condition....
customer_reviews.text: this phone was is great shape. took it to Verizon and they installed the SIM card for free while activating it. now I have the same service with a new phone and still no contract. Very, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: M. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Usually good phones
customer_reviews.text: like every Motorola I've had it runs fairly smoothly and is easy to do whatever you're trying to accomplish. However the Android system is out of date so many of my apps don't work which I should have researched further. Also I've had it less than a month and it shut off last night and will not turn back on. Won't take a charge just plain won't work
customer_reviews.author: carol dinger

customer_reviews.title: ... I bought this I thought it would be another crap phone, but hell did this surprise me as ...
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this I thought it would be another crap phone, but hell did this surprise me as it was faster than my iphone 5s and the battery life was amazing.! I would definitely by this if you like good battery life and even better performance out of your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kobe Latta

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: My wife washed her iPhone 5c. I have had and iPhone since they came out but have been thinking about getting a droid so my wife sped up the process lol. I got this phone used for $84 with free shipping. Phone looks new works great took a little getting used too work similar to the iPhone so didn't take long. It is much faster and uu can do a lot more. Shipped to me very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Nickscar

customer_reviews.title: droid life= AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE!!!!!!!!!! BOUGHT THIS PHONE JAN.10, 2015. IT WORKED FINE UNTIL MAY I HAD TO REBOOT IT. IT STARTED LAGGING REAL BAD. HAD TO DO IT TWO MORE TIMES. AND NOW JUST BEFORE NEW YEAR'S EVE IT FROZE AND DIDNT WANT TO REBOOT. TOOK IT TO VERIZON THEY COULDN'T DO ANYTHING WITH IT. I HAVE SO MUCH I WANT OFF THIS PHONE BUT NOW I CANT GET ANY OF IT OFF.
customer_reviews.author: Tavia

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone! It's fast, can do all the things, newer, more expensive phones can do. The battery lasts so much longer than other phones. Can't say enough good things about this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kraygen

customer_reviews.title: Either this phone is bad or im just very unlucky.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I was just unlucky or this phone is just bad. The WiFi will only get 2 bars even right next to my router. The touch screen stays active even with the phone to my ear. Battery life is about half a day or so. It drops calls and or service out of no where and restarts itself every other day or so. If I had another phone to use I would have sent this one back already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great option to use on Verizon prepaid
customer_reviews.text: Great phone at a great price. I purchased this phone to use with my Verizon prepaid account. It is a much better phone than they offer on the Verizon website for the same price. Got the new phone in the mail, put the sim card from my old prepid 4g lte phone into the new one and was good to go. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Dana Mickelson

customer_reviews.title: great camera OK phone reception
customer_reviews.text: nice big screen not as big as some new phones but much cheeper could get better reception though. Great camera lousy built in app to sort pictures / albums better free ones available

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I have not had this phone very long but so far I love it. The graphics look good it is pretty fast and I love the way they have it set up. It does get a little hot but nothing to bad. I will update this once I have the phone for a while...but so far so good

customer_reviews.text: It was really nice and very slim if it wasn't for the phone being defective , the screen would freeze and it would turn on and off by itself, My Verizon carrier tried for 30 minutes to fix the problem but in the end they said it was defective and to return it. I'm pretty sure I would have kept it, returned it and went with Samsung.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: The phone met and exceeded all my expectations. The shipment only took one day from when I ordered it. The sellers were very quick to respond to my questions and concerns. I am highly satisfied!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good phone unless you want to use it for more than a year
customer_reviews.text: I first purchased this phone through Verizon. It lasted a year through moderately heavy use (texting, social media, internet, youtube). After a year it went haywire. It would turn off and not come back on for hours. Then it didn't come back on at all, leaving only a green light. I lost everything on it. Silly me, I purchased a replacement through amazon. Same exact thing happened one year later. I can't believe I wasted my money on this. A family member has the same phone and it's worked fine for two years. Purchase at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Initially phone was fine, after a week
customer_reviews.text: Initially phone was fine, after a week, began locking up and freezing. As of 4 days ago, the phone is dead. I have not contacted seller, caveat emptor on my part. T'was probably the luck of the draw on the re furb, as we have bought refurbs before and had great success.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a Verizon store display phone with a factory installed demo app that does not stop running. Found this out after my second trip to my local Verizon store. You can uninstall it and it comes back less than a minute later. It interrupts all of the things you do on a smart phone. The screen has popped up 3 times as I am writing this. Also, the screen does not turn off unless you power the phone down. Total waste of time and money. I'll be sending this one back and ordering a different phone from a different vendor.
customer_reviews.author: BKlimcsak

customer_reviews.title: Problem with product

If ur into gaming and video streaming spend a little more on something better. But if u want something to call and text then its good. Snapchats suck and sometimes wont let u post them. Group messages are horrible ha ha ha it like takes a while to get all the messages, sometimes dont even get them till a day later. Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram are ok if you are just surfing through it or posting thing occasionally.

customer_reviews.title: This phone is terrible. It cannot handle any of the OS updates
customer_reviews.text: This phone is terrible. It cannot handle any of the OS updates. The issues include programs shutting off in mid-use, significant lag in opening programs and the dreaded "Unfortunately contacts stopped working". Contacts is a basic built-in original program and I often have to try opening it 4 or 5 times before it finally works. This phone is a waste. Motorola has made an awful, awful phone. The Samsung Galaxy S3, which is an older phone, handled updates without loosing much of a beat. I don't think that I will ever buy another Motorola product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander G. Trochez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best phone for a 16 year old boy ever... My son is very rough on equipment...lol. First he had it in his back pocket and cracked the screen, a few days later he dropped it in the toilet and finally it fell out of his hand onto a rock and shattered about a half inch all the way across the bottom of the screen. It was so shattered that the glass came out. After all it has been through I was sure we would be buying him another phone but I was very surprised cause this phone never skipped a beat and is still working :)

I have had this phone before and loved it but the one I received from this sale was junk. Judging by the statistics of getting a bad one, since I got it you will probably do fine if you order.

customer_reviews.text: I like the way it fits my hand and the lightness of it. It is much lighter than my Samsung and fits my hand better but is taking awhile to get used to the difference in it from the Droid Maxx which I was trying to get closer to than my Samsung is. I am getting used to it but wish it had a louder microphone. I have a hard time hearing it when I get a call or text. It also won't let me send a picture over WiFi. I have to turn my Data on to send a picture. Anna

Any time I would use this phone to call or search something on the internet I would lose signal after a few mins and the phone would tell me it was searching for sim. I only bought this as a temporary phone so it wasn't too long that I had to deal with this and it made for an excellent trade in. Thats about all the worth it had.

(I do believe its personal opinion)

customer_reviews.title: This phone is junk!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This review follows after only a 2.5 month use. This phone is absolute junk! There's a 20 sec delay on anything I do. I'm looking into replacing this piece of junk as soon as I can. Very disgusted for the price I paid. My old Razor was nothing like this and the camera is very very bad quality. Very very disappointed. To think I gave my Galaxy III up for this phone makes me really mad . Receipt shows item "new" but this phone seems refurbished...

customer_reviews.title: love motorola!

Luckily my husband just bought the same phone so I used his. Other than those 2 little things I'm quite pleased with the phone itself.

Now almost four months later I no longer have the phone thanks to it crashing and everything was done to try to power the phone back on. Nothing worked. That was after over a month of problems with the phone being slow, force closing all my apps and powering off frequently. I will never purchase from this site or Amazon again. Too many problems with this phone and other things I have bought.

customer_reviews.title: Crappy phone. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I lost my phone and was hoping this one could hold me over until I can renew my contract. not so much...Horrible phone. Worked for about a week. Now, nothing. You can barely dial to call, or text. Use any apps. It's a piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: cami

customer_reviews.title: Another excellent purchase from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Another excellent purchase from Amazon. The phone was and is exactly as described and worth the money. BTW the phone was brand new with a charger and all the necessary cords. I truly don't understand the negative comments.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Phone turned on but won't pick up sim card photos nor numbers..As this phone is dicontinued and this is my second time ordering it not a happy camper...
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Doster

customer_reviews.title: the best phone I've ever had and the price is great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Steal of a deal!!! This is an awesome phone. It might be a bit older, but it works like a charm! The specs are better than an iPhone 5, and it's a great looking phone. Newer Verizon phones are automatically unlocked, so straight talk worked immediately!!!
customer_reviews.author: Student

customer_reviews.title: Okay phone
customer_reviews.text: Only used it for like 6 months this phone breaks easy even in a OtterBox.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

product_meta.title: Motorola Droid RAZR HD 16GB XT926 Black - Verizon
product_meta.description: The Motorola Droid RAZR HD is an amazingly thin, Android smartphone with 24-hour battery life. This update to the original Droid RAZR improves the display by offering a 4.7-inch HD Super AMOLED screen, while also increasing battery size, processor, and adding NFC. Featuring a dual-core 1.5 GHz processor and 1GB RAM, this smartphone is ready to multitask games, photos, music, videos, apps and more seamlessly. The Droid RAZR HD is also equipped with 4G LTE data, WiFi, 16GB internal storage, and quadband GSM and WCDMA modes for international use. Access thousands of apps, games, movies, books, and music on Google's Play Store.
feature_bullets: This update to the original Droid RAZR improves the display by offering a 4.7-inch HD Super AMOLED screen, while also increasing battery size, processor, and adding NFC
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers but are not compatible with CDMA Carriers.
The Motorola Droid RAZR HD is an amazingly thin, Android smartphone with 24-hour battery life
This product has been extensively tested, is certified to be 100% functional, and ready for activation
Featuring a dual-core 1.5 GHz processor and 1GB RAM, this smartphone is ready to multitask games, photos, music, videos, apps and more seamlessly
The Droid RAZR HD is also equipped with 4G LTE data, WiFi, 16GB internal storage, and quadband GSM and WCDMA modes for international use. SIM card is not included.
